about: Arman Ayva Personal Website Arman Ayva – Montreal Jazz Composer & Hobbyist 🎷 Where modern jazz meets cinematic storytelling. Arman Ayva is a Montreal-based composer whose sound merges the soul of classic jazz with the freedom of funk and the mysticism of world music. From Lens to Loops: A Storyboard of Sound Before I began composing jazz, my world was framed through a camera lens. As a photographer and amateur filmmaker, I spent years capturing visual stories. Today, I use those same visual instincts to storyboard with sound. The Montreal Fusion: Armenian Soul meets Jazz-Funk Based in the creative crossroads of Montreal, my music is a deeply personal exploration of heritage and rhythm. I bridge the warmth of Armenian folk motifs with the high-energy freedom of 1970s fusion and analog synth textures. A Studio-First Philosophy I am not a performing artist; I am a studio-focused hobbyist dedicated to the architecture of sound. By focusing exclusively on production within Apple Logic Pro, I prioritize the intricate layering of live bass and global percussion. Beyond Composing: Curating the Vibe Creation is only half the journey. As the curator of the 'Funky Jazz Mood Lifter' playlist on Spotify, I connect with hundreds of followers who share a passion for bass-heavy grooves. Ready to dive into the music? Explore the Music & Cinematic Stories → Music Production & Licensing Disclaimer All music compositions presented on this website are original works produced by Arman Ayva. We adhere to the highest standards of artistic and legal integrity. Technical Production Details These works are created primarily using Apple Logic Pro and professional digital audio tools. Some compositions may include sounds or samples from the Logic Pro library. privacy: Arman Ayva Personal Website Privacy Policy Last updated: Jan 27, 2026 1. Overview This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you visit https://www.armanayva.com . We are committed to protecting your privacy, specifically in compliance with **Quebec's Law 25 (Bill 64)** regarding the protection of personal information. 2. Information We Collect When you visit the Site, we automatically collect certain information via: ● Vercel Analytics: Device type, browser, and general location (City/Country) for performance monitoring. ● Google Analytics: Interaction data to help us understand which blog posts or music projects are most popular. ● TikTok Pixel: Conversion tracking to measure the effectiveness of our music promotion. 3. AI & Neural Interactions Interactions with Professor Groove are processed via the Groq API (Llama 3.3) . Conversations are transient and are not stored on our servers, nor are they used to train third-party AI models. We do not link chat history to your personal identity.This agent features a local fallback mode to ensure service continuity. When the primary neural engine is over-capacity, a local rule-based response system is activated. 4. Third-Party Services Our site includes embeds from YouTube, Spotify, Bandcamp, and JotForm . These third parties may collect your IP address and use cookies if you interact with their players or forms. We recommend reviewing their respective privacy policies. 5. Your Rights & Law 25 Under Quebec's Law 25, you have the right to access, rectify, or request the deletion of your personal data. You may also withdraw your consent to data collection at any time. For any inquiries regarding your privacy, please contact **Arman Ayva** via the contact form on this site.
